content.question: If the substitution <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the square root of x equals sine y"> <semantics> <mrow> <msqrt> <mi>x</mi> </msqrt> <mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaGcaaWdaeaapeGaamiEaaWcbeaakiabg2da9iGacohacaGGPbGa aiOBaiaadMhaaaa@3C33@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> is made in the integrand of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral from 0 to one half of the square root of x divided by the square root of open parentheses 1 minus x close parentheses with respect to x"> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><munderover> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mrow> <mn>1</mn><mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow> </munderover> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msqrt> <mi>x</mi> </msqrt> </mrow> <mrow> <msqrt> <mrow> <mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow> </msqrt> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXbWdaeaapeWaaSaaa8aabaWdbmaakaaapaqaa8qacaWG4baa leqaaaGcpaqaa8qadaGcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaiabgkHiTiaadIhaaS qabaaaaaWdaeaapeGaaGimaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaiaac+cacaaIYaaa niabgUIiYdGccaWGKbGaamiEaaaa@4213@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> , the resulting integral is
